item.title: M1 Wk3: Instructions
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: Field work and ethical data collection II Goals for this week Continue the Graveyard Project Develop a webmap of the site Explore the connections between what you are doing and what you are reading: graveyards are emotional spaces Listen Feed for the podcast here. Read Cook, Katherine. 2018 Negotiating Memory: Funerary Commemoration as Social Change in Barbados. African and Black Diaspora: An International Journal. link Pillatt, Toby. et al.

item.title: Webmaps
